negative_encounters.title: Bovine Invasion
negative_encounters.description: A herd of cattle has made its way onto the railway.
negative_encounters.effect: The delay from clearing the tracks costs you {curr}5.

negative_encounters.title: Are Ewe Kidding
negative_encounters.description: A herd of sheep has made its way onto the railway.
negative_encounters.effect: The delay from clearing the tracks costs you {curr}2.

negative_encounters.title: Field Day
negative_encounters.description: Someone's pushed an old scarecrow onto the tracks.
negative_encounters.effect: The delay from clearing the tracks costs you {curr}7.

negative_encounters.title: Strike Action
negative_encounters.description: Railway staff have decided to strike for better working conditions.
negative_encounters.effect: Spend {curr}{value} on improving the staff room.

negative_encounters.title: Snow Day
negative_encounters.description: A blizzard has rendered almost all railways useless.
negative_encounters.effect: Spend {curr}{value} on snow ploughs across all lines.

negative_encounters.title: Derailed
negative_encounters.description: The train got derailed in a field.
negative_encounters.effect: Spend {curr}12 on an engineer assist the train.

negative_encounters.title: Sleeping on the Job
negative_encounters.description: The driver blew past a red signal aspect, bringing the train to an automatic halt.

negative_encounters.title: Rock Bottom
negative_encounters.description: The train crashed into a boulder that fell onto the track.
negative_encounters.effect: A third of the cargo was destroyed in the crash, costing you {curr}{value}.

negative_encounters.title: Major Incident
negative_encounters.description: A major incident occurred at the origin station, requiring a mass emergency response.

negative_encounters.title: Engine Failure
negative_encounters.description: An engineering fault caused the engine to explode during the journey, injuring the driver.
negative_encounters.effect: You are being fined {curr}{value} for negligence.

negative_encounters.title: The Great Train Robbery
negative_encounters.description: Along its journey, the train gets ransacked by a gang of armed robbers.
negative_encounters.effect: You lose three quarters of the entire shipment, totalling {curr}{value} in damage.

negative_encounters.title: Splash
negative_encounters.description: A particularly strong gust of wind causes the train to dump all of its cargo into a river as it goes over a bridge.
negative_encounters.effect: You lose the entire shipment, totalling {curr}{value}.

positive_encounters.title: Ahead of Schedule
positive_encounters.description: The train arrives ahead of schedule, gaining an additional bonus from the client.
positive_encounters.effect: The client rewards you with a {curr}7 bonus.

positive_encounters.title: Extra Cargo
positive_encounters.description: Some extra cargo mysteriously appears on the train.

positive_encounters.title: Mysterious Stranger
positive_encounters.description: A msyterious stranger gives the driver a suitcase of money at the destination station.
